pages.text: Branchiosaurs are a family of temnospondyls which lived from the Carboniferous to Permian periods. They had external gills and had an overall juvenile appearance. One species, $(o)Melanerpeton$() even had fossilized skin patters, which was a sort of checkered pattern. They were generally small and spent most of their time in the water.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Spawn like Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
